pageContext.claim: “Remember when I said, 'Russia, if you're listening --' in front of this massive, 'Russia, if you're listening, find out where her emails are.' and then everybody laughed, I laughed, they actually play it all the time. "When he spoke to Russia." Do you ever see it? And they cut it off before the end, they don't see any -- I say, 'Russia if you're listening.' Oh, these people is sick.”
pageContext.analysis: Many things are wrong in this retelling. Trump did not laugh when made his 2016 "Russia, if you're listening" request -- for help obtaining deleted Hillary Clinton emails; he appeared serious and one cannot detect any laughter in the room. News organizations displayed the video correctly without deceptively editing.
